Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: N. Buchheit
Reviews.Content: I've had the Olympus VR-340 for just over a month now, and used it quite heavily, as I was traveling overseas for 4 weeks of that time. Here are my thoughts, as a regular guy who likes to take good pictures, but is far from a camera buff.Size:The VR-340 is on the big end of point-and-shoot cameras, at least as far as I could tell. It doesn't look that different until you hold another camera up to it though, at which point you can really see the difference. It seems to me that its thickness is the biggest difference. Still fits in a pocket great though, so don't worry about that. It also fits perfectly into the Lowepro Apex 20 AW -Black, if you're looking for a case.Zoom:This is where the camera's extra size really pays off. I used a camera with 5x optical zoom for years, and that still seems to be the general standard. 10x is a HUGE difference. Well worth the extra money, even if you're just getting the camera for vacation. You'll be amazed how often you want to take a picture of something that's too far away for a camera with 5x zoom to pull it off without the picture getting grainy. I also really like the trigger zoom system on this camera (the zoom control is a little trigger surrounding the shutter button, so you just use the same finger as you use to take the picture itself). Once in a while, the trigger gets caught a bit on the edge of my pocket when I pull the camera out, but I don't think it's bad enough to break the trigger. My previous camera was an Olympus and had the same system, and I slid it in and out of my pocket for 4 years with no problems.Picture Quality:I'm pretty pleased with the picture quality. 16 megapixels is a ridiculous amount. I honestly can't imagine the average person could tell the difference between 16 and 8 or something on normal pictures. That said, if you can have more, why not? It at least opens up the option of blowing your photos up larger. My only real complaint about this camera is that I've had some problems taking pictures without some blurring. I've tried fooling with the shutter speed, flash, etc., and the problem occurs very rarely. But when it does, it's pretty annoying (hence 4 stars instead of 5). It's not like I'm jerking the camera all over the place when I take the photos either. When the problem occurs, it occurs even if I prop my elbows on a table to keep my hands steady. The only shaking would be from my heartbeat, which is fairly tough to control.... Maybe there's a way to fix the problem with the settings - I just haven't found it yet. With that caveat, I've been very pleased with the picture quality.Features:I'm a big fan of the features on the camera, though I really don't use them all. Very easy to adjust the ISO, white balance, flash, etc. if you want to, or just let the camera figure out the scene and make the necessary adjustments for you. I found the camera did a very good job generally of identifying the type of photo being taken and adjusting the settings accordingly. I tried the "Beauty" setting, where you can allegedly fix portrait photos in the camera itself, but didn't really find it very helpful. The "Scenes" are great though - the "Landscape" one enhances blues and greens, "Candlelight" enhances yellows & oranges, "Nighttime Landscape" keeps the shutter open a bit longer to gather more light, etc. Big fan of those. I also really like the continuous/sequential setting. If you hold down the shutter on these settings, you can take a TON of sequential photos. The camera takes another photo every 0.5-1 second, depending on your SD card and how many megapixels you want each picture to be. I rigged it up with a rubberband and a small rubber bumper (like you stick to the inside of cabinets to prevent them from banging when you close them), left it on a stand, and took sequential photos of myself and my girlfriend, too. Pretty easy to do.Movie Quality:The VR-340 says it records movies in 720p. That seems about right. It's not as good as a dedicated video camera, so you shouldn't buy this for its video-recording capabilities. That said, the movies it does record are quite good for a point-and-shoot camera. The image is a bit jerky if you move the camera around very much while you record, but it's pretty good if you can hold it still. You can also choose whether to record sound with the video or not. Basically, I think this is an excellent feature on the camera, and it's more than enough for a tourist who wants to record the occasional video on vacation, but takes mostly still photos.In Sum:I'm pleased with the VR-340. It does everything I need it to and more. The videos and photos it takes are generally excellent, with the caveats that I struggled on occasion to get the shutter speed fast enough to take a non-blurry photo and the videos get a bit jerky if you move the camera around too much or too quickly. I would definitely buy this camera again. Shop around a bit. I think you'll see that every other camera-maker charges significantly more for a camera with this array of features. I don't pretend to know enough about cameras and photography to critique the finer points of the photo quality or anything, but for a regular person looking for a solid camera you can stick in your pocket, this is great.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: AnonymousZ8200
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this camera. Most point-and-shoot pictures come out great and operating it is intuitive. The different scene and filter settings are great.Scene settings* portrait - for portrait-style shots* landscape - slightly emphasizes blues and greens* night scene - for shooting illuminated night scenes at a slower shutter speed* night portrait - for shooting subjects with illuminated backgrounds* action - for fast-moving action shots without blurring* indoor - for shooting indoors* candle- for shooting in low-light settings (e.g., candlelight)* self-portrait - for taking a picture of yourself while holding the camera* sunset - slightly emphasizes the reds and yellows* fireworks - shoots fireworks at night with a slower shutter speed* cuisine - for still life photography* documents - for text* beach & snow - for snowing landscapes, mountains, and seascapes* pet - for animalsI am still getting used to to using the portrait, night, and fireworks scenes.  The portrait scene mode doesn't seem to do well indoors and the night and fireworks scenes have such a slow shutter speed that a slight movement gives the image tracers. The automatic setting takes great indoor pictures most of the time, but the pictures seem to come out better when I use the indoor scene option.The VR 340 also has a burst feature under the program auto setting, which is great for taking several action shots and sorting out the best ones later. When it is set on high speed, the flash doesn't take.  This makes taking indoor pictures using the burst a little challenging.  You can, however, use a flash in the single burst mode. Burst mode works well outdoors.Close-up pictures have amazingly crisp detail and the zoom is great.  The VR 340 is compact, light-weight, and easy to carry around.Fun stuff - this camera also has seven magic settings:* pop art - exaggerates the colors* pin-hole - gives a black fog-like circular border around the photo* fish eye - makes the image close-up in the center then tapers out* drawing - makes the image look like a coloring page* soft focus - softens the hard details in a picture; gives pictures a sort of angelic effect* punk - washes the image out with a pink and black contrast* sparkle - anything that shines is exaggerated with a twinkling effectAlthough many of these effects can be done with editing programs, it is kind of cool to see them beforehand.  The effect is also instant; what you see on the screen before you take the shot is what you get afterward.I have been disappointed with cameras before, but for it's size, weight, and price; this is a great camera if you want to take close-to-professional quality pictures just about anywhere and be creative too.

Reviews.Title: Professional Looking Photos FIVE STARS!!!
Reviews.Author: Fiddles
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure why this camera does not have many, many more 5 star reviews. I have been trying for years to find a point and shoot camera that is in a nice price range that took good pictures. I have purchased many and have returned many. I tried again as this Olympus model seemed to have what I wanted. I liked the fact that it had some playful features like the fisheye, soft focus, pinhole, etc. I have had a lot of fun playing around with those. But, even without those features I would have bought this camera and paid more for it. It takes the most beautiful, clear, professional looking photos. I've posted a few here on this Amazon review. Truthfully, the photos showing here speak volumes on the quality of photos produced from this camera. There are plenty of things to learn with the camera regarding its settings and whatnot. But, it did not take me long to learn the basics. Some of the other settings like 'beauty fix' I have not tried yet but am sure will be just an additional great feature to this camera. Honestly, I am tempted to buy another one just in case it gets discontinued. It's so hard to find a camera that does this well in this price range. I've paid several hundred dollars more on cameras in the past and received photos without quality this high. I'm impressed and it's about time.To add, the image stabilization is so good I can be moving around alot and the photo still comes out clear. I cannot say enough about this camera!

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Mattinerie
Reviews.Content: I grew up a photographer. I had a darkroom in Junior High School and up until 15 years ago I shot 35mm.Since the digital revolution I have had 6 cameras - all pt n shoot w/ progressively more MPs. I mostly drop them or break the screen which renders them useless.This camera has all the features that I could possibly want:1- sturdy cover for the screen so it will not crack2- a wide angle lens to capture the WHOLE scene - and w/16mp I can always crop later3- a very adequate 10x zoom4- good in low light situations5- a battery that lasts forever and a meter on the screenNow to be fair- I hate flash and do not use it - It is not natural - I don't know anyone who has a instant bright light that comes from his forehead- but I haven't traveled that much. So the complaints that I read here about the flash or blurry indoor photos go in one ear and out the other because for me and my art, life is rarely sharp and clear.  If there is enough light to shoot @ 1/50th sec the shots are sharp.  For the shots I take in dark bars or @ night - the blur is part of the scene!In conclusion, I don't carry a dslr because of the bulk and $$, but this camera I can take out of my pocket and be ready to shoot before you can say Olympus.

Reviews.Title: Beauty Fix works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Return2Liberty
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I wanted to be able to "beautify" photos, especially portraits, in the camera, not after I'd downloaded to my computer. The process is easy to use and does a good job smoothing wrinkles, whitening teeth and even enhancing eyes and smiles.Wrinkles are a fact of life as we get older. When we look at ourselves or others we overlook the flaws and imperfections. But the camera lens sees and shows all. I don't feel like I'm "cheating" by "improving" the original photo. Instead, I'm changing the image to the way I perceive the subject.The 10X optical zoom is amazing on a camera this size, and the preset functions are easy to use.I see the price has dropped FIFTY DOLLARS since I bought it. :-(I made a before and after picture to post here, but apparently photos aren't allowed.

Reviews.Title: Poor flash picture quality
Reviews.Author: Zephyrxc
Reviews.Content: This camera has never taken a sharp indoor photo. The flash goes off, but the pictures are always blurred. In daylight, the camera works fine. Sent the unit back to manufacturer. They claimed unit was set to macro and sent it back to us. Camera is confirmed to not be on macro setting, and indoor pictures are still very poor. Unless you are only going to take pictures in bright sunlight, buy a different camera.

Reviews.Title: Almost There...
Reviews.Author: Bloostreakin'
Reviews.Content: For outdoor shooting during the day this camera takes good pictures.  In bright light the picture quality is very good, this isn't a DSLR camera and won't take pictures like one but for an affordable point and shoot it does a fine job.  The camera falls a bit short for outdoor shooting of objects at a distance in low light conditions (i.e. in the dark) but if you're close enough for the flash to be effective it does fine.  I haven't had any issues with indoor pictures like some of the previous reviewers have mentioned, the indoor pics have turned out just fine.We just got back from a week at Disney World and I bought this camera to take with us.  I also own a Canon PowerShot that costs more than twice as much as the Olympus.  The bright light photos taken with the Olympus are crisp and vivid, it greatly exceeded my expectations in that aspect.  I also really enjoy the HD video feature, keep in mind you can't zoom when shooting video with this camera and it also takes video in 720 resolution.  When shooting video the audio quality is acceptable for most applications.  If you want to be able to zoom or are looking for 1080 keep shopping for something else.  It only fell short in one area: shooting at night in low light conditions without the flash.  If you have a tripod it the pictures would turn out fine, but even the slightest shake will result in some blurring.  That's where the Canon really does a much better job.Overall I give it 4 stars, the camera offers many options and is hard to beat for the price.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Olympus VR340
Reviews.Author: Barbara Bak
Reviews.Content: Am super happy with this camera, I have several camera's ranging from very expensive with several lenses, tripods, filters etc to small SLR's this little guy takes the best photos, took photos of fireworks on the 4th, best I ever got, take lots of nature photos, great birds, a bumble bee in a flower, did I mention I really love it, never having had a digital camera before took me a while to get accustomed but now, its with me all the time.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for a small price
Reviews.Author: Man of the West
Reviews.Content: I am involved in real estate and use this camera to take many indoor photos of houses (kitchens, baths, special features, etc.).  The flash works well and my photos are very clear. There are several image sizes to choose from including 1280 x 960 which provides a very clear image and yet the photos are still easy to send via email. Many of the smaller point and shoot cameras lack this image size and require you to use either 640 x 480 (too blurry) or a larger size which results in large files which are difficult to send via email. The camera is very fast and starts instantly when you press the on button. Similarly, taking a photo is also very fast with no lag once you hit the shoot button. The images are fairly wide angle and not narrow and boxy. Most of the negative reviews of this camera seem to be from people who didn't read the instructions and/or didn't take the time to find which settings work best for their needs. After I played around with the settings and tried various combinations, I had no problems with blurry indoor photos which some have complained about. This is an inexpensive small camera and the performance is quite good for the price. I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants good photos but doesn't want to spend a lot of money. My only complaint is that it didn't come with a memory card and I had to provide my own.

Reviews.Title: worst digital camera I've ever owned
Reviews.Author: Leigh
Reviews.Content: Sorry, I found this to be the worst digital camera I've ever owned. At the store I could scroll through menus but not take pix, so I didn't know what I was getting. It's a nice size and weight, and the controls are easy to navigate and do a good job of explaining what's what. Unfortunately the preset settings are almost always off. iAuto never works correctly and the shots are often washed out or too dark. Trying to choose a scene mode is frustrating; it's a point and shoot trial and error guessing game. On top of that, probably 60% of the photos come out blurred even if the camera is on a tripod. Photo sizes larger than VGA usually come out fuzzy too. Maybe it's just me, but I've never had this much trouble with a digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Some trade offs, but a great camera
Reviews.Author: D. Rapson "geekacres"
Reviews.Content: I was recently at a gathering where I wanted to hand off my camera for someone to take my picture. They had difficulty with it, and so started the search for a simple camera that I would also enjoy.This Olympus has really fit the bill. One of the FIRST things I noticed with many point and shoots is that the optical zoom is often limited to 5x for entry level cameras. This Olympus has a 10x optical zoom that really just blew me away once I first got my hands on it. Standing at the edge of our porch, I took a picture of the same tree from wide open, to 5x, to 10x. Great zoom for such a compact camera. And the display on the back of the VR-340 is nice and clear, giving you a good representation of the picture you've taken.I did try the camera at an evening baseball game. In lower light, some of the action was blurred. I'm still running on automatic, so maybe with some tweaking, I can get better results.At the end of the day, I'm happy with the performance and feature set for the money I paid(less than a hundred). Of note, you do need to bring your own SD card to the party. That's fine by me, because I was assured of a Class 10 card since I bought it. Additionally, they say that the best camera is the one that's with you. While I love my DSLR, this compact point and shoot is easily pocketable and does a great job of capturing those moments. Not perfect, but very, very good.

Reviews.Title: Very nice digital point-and-shoot!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with this camera, especially with the 10x zoom.  Shot a wedding with it as a backup and it performed well, even in low light outdoors at night. I would have given it 5 stars except for the fact that it does not zoom while recording videos.  I guess I didn't read the technical data well enough before I ordered, but for the price this camera is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: unpleasantly surprised at this camera
Reviews.Author: V. Morrison
Reviews.Content: i'm an oly fangirl. i shoot exclusively with olympus cameras so buying this was a no-brainer for me. a few things i didn't like about the camera, maybe i got a bad copy. the photos inside were horrible, none were in focus and the flash was horrible. i don't expect images i get from my micro four-thirds collection, but i do expect decent.  i know olympus cameras and what to expect, but i just couldn't keep this. it arrived on friday and i shipped it back on monday.  it was a gift for my mother. it was actually too small for her, but a decent size if i bought it for myself. i still love olympus and will always shoot olympus, but for point and shoot cameras i will have to look for either a higher end olympus or another brand.

Reviews.Title: fuzzy
Reviews.Author: bobby128
Reviews.Content: fuzzy, thats what all  the indoor pictures look like. I agree with Zephyrxc with his review this camera takes the worst indoor pictures I have ever seen.you would get better pictures with an old kodak through away camera.

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong!!
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: Bought this for an easy camera to take to Disneyland, versus lugging my beloved Nikon D80. This new camera has now become my go-to picture taker. I love it!

Reviews.Title: crap
Reviews.Author: Kelly B
Reviews.Content: I got this as a gift to replace another camera from another company that I had been given, but wouldn't load the software.  I should have listened to the poor ratings when I was choosing a replacement camera, but the good reviews outweighed the bad in volume.  The camera came in a bubble mailer, which was my first sign that things weren't going to be good.  When I took it out of the box, the shutter was partially open, which was my second sign, but I hoped that once I turned it on the shutter would be fine.  There was no plastic film over the LCD screen like most new cameras, but I thought maybe they just don't do that.  I plugged the camera in to charge the battery (it doesn't come charged at all) and waited.  While I waited, I loaded the disc and downloaded the software and the manual.  yes, you have to download the manual which tells you how to download the manual! kind of funny.  After the battery charged, I turned the camera on and was looking at the features on the menu before I realized that it wasn't my finger over the lens causing the blackness on the screen.  The shutter never opened.  It stayed in the same exact position, partially opened.  I thought maybe if I took a picture it would fix it.  Nope.  The shutter never opened.  Considering the camera feels like a piece of tin, I shouldn't be surprised, but Olympus is know to be a good brand and this camera got some really good reviews, so I was surprised.  And yes, the camera came from this seller.

Reviews.Title: great camera, but buy a memory card!
Reviews.Author: Victoria Sutton
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and takes great pictures, but it only holds 9 pictures without a memory card, so buy one.  I got a 32 GB card ($20), and it holds nearly 7000 pictures (fewer with videos too), so you could easily buy a much smaller card.  It is more pink than red.

Reviews.Title: Olympus has me sold
Reviews.Author: Cosmo Girl
Reviews.Content: Great camera, quick start up, clear photos with great color. I wanted a high end camera that can fit in my pocket and be used on the go. I keep it in a neoprene case in my purse all the time and it is not even noticed in there. Holds a great charge too.

Reviews.Title: My moms loves it
Reviews.Author: natalie
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom for Christmas and she absolutely loves it. This was worth the money. The picture quality is excellent and they do not come out blurry when she zooms in.

Reviews.Title: Solid, no blur here...
Reviews.Author: AJinFLA
Reviews.Content: I own a modeling agency and we needed a quick point and shoot camera for various generic reasons.  We have tons of high end gear to compare this too, so our expectations were low.  We were concerned about some of the reviews talking about the picture being blurry, and the only thing I can think is they aren't using their settings properly, because this camera has been a pleasant surprise.The pictures are excellent, no problems indoors with the flashUsing the "fine" setting the pictures are great quality, the zoom is very effective, and the multi-picture feature even takes good clear shots.This could easily be a $300-$400 camera.Maybe the manufacturing is inconsistent, because the camera I purchased has none of the problems I read in the negative reviews.

Reviews.Title: I'm sorry I missed my window to return
Reviews.Author: Amanda L Harper
Reviews.Content: This camera takes horrible blurry pictures.  I'm just sorry I can no longer return it.  I waited too long.  I am now using my dad's old camera from 2008 that takes way better pictures and doesn't frustrate me so much.  My X-Mas pictures are horrible and now I have nothing for that year.  I watched the video and read the directions carefully and it still takes bad pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: DJC
Reviews.Content: I needed to upgrade an older digital camera and this Olympus turned out to be perfect. It is so much smaller and the view finder is three times the size of the older camera. It takes great pictures and  is very easy to use. I really am happy with my purchase and would highly recommend this camera to both a beginner or someone looking to upgrade..

Reviews.Title: It is complete
Reviews.Author: Johana Coromoto Toro Puentes
Reviews.Content: This is a complete camera, it has a good zoom, a good resolution (16 MP), I recomended it to people who wants a good camera with a good price

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: This camera so far is very nice. I've had it a few days and have been taking random pictures of friends and my cats in the dark and in the light and it's doing just fine. It's nice and compact and easy to operate and charging is very simple. It's also very easy to put the pictures on my computer because my computer has a card reader slot. No formatting needed! So far i have no complaints about this product.

Reviews.Title: What a great camera!
Reviews.Author: Richard P Bjornson
Reviews.Content: We absolutely love this camera, the macro setting is awesome.The only thing that could make this camera better is if it had an underwater housing.

Reviews.Title: Olympus VR-340 16MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom (Black)
Reviews.Author: Stella
Reviews.Content: Gave the Olympus VR-340 16MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom (Black) as a Birthday persent to my son to replace an older model Olympus that was stolen from Valley Fair. He was very pleased and the pictures he has taken are so clear and wow!! For the money, this little compact camera is the BEST choice!

Reviews.Title: Good quality for the price
Reviews.Author: David J. Pittenger
Reviews.Content: I needed a simple point and click camera for various events when having a large camera is not practical. Camera works very well for this task.

Reviews.Title: Sleek Olympus VR=340
Reviews.Author: G-girl
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a father's day gift and he loves it. It is small enough to fit in a man's hand without being dwarfed and its functions and gadgets are enough to keep him busy. Now I am interested in having one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Soft Image Quality and Zero Quality Video
Reviews.Author: Titan1776
Reviews.Content: The "hd" video mode is a joke, as it is almost with the same image quality as 360p standard definition video. The picture quality is very soft, and if you zoom in, even a little the image quality gets worse. I do not reccomend it.

Reviews.Title: DISAPPOINTED
Reviews.Author: James Alekna
Reviews.Content: Have owned several Olympus cameras.  Bought a VR-340 for my granddaughter.  She loves it.  This one that I purchased for ME must have been factory defective.  Charged the battery.  Camera would not turn on.  Removed battery, rre-installed.  It worked. Something fishy??  Then, camera would not focus.  Depressed button half way.  Still no focus.  Played with it for two hours.  Something definitely wrong wth this one.  Returned it.  So disappointed.  Really wanted the pocket camera for business trip to DC.  Didn''t have enough time  to re-order.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: ruth
Reviews.Content: just what I needed, a perfect camera, excellent pictures, and more, and an added bonus, the price was reasonable!I would definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: Defective item
Reviews.Author: KATHRYN E STEAD
Reviews.Content: The model or battery I was sent was defective. It did not work so i returned it. Hence the low rating.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for those new to the photography game, with one glaring flaw.
Reviews.Author: Arthur Smith
Reviews.Content: Upon receiving this camera I was overwhelmed with joy. While visually appealing, the help options within camera gave me easy-to-understand instructions on how to use the device. I can easily say I lucked out in the first camera department but it wasn't until the next day that the problem arose.No SD card.Its probably my fault for not looking through when I first got it (but, hey, first time I had a digital camera.) Despite all that if you come well prepared with your memory card then by all means, I strongly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Memory card not included
Reviews.Author: Renee Smith
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as a gift for my 17 year old son. He is very happy with the camera. The only thing is that it did not come with its own memory card.

Reviews.Title: Replaced dead Canon
Reviews.Author: SharBear
Reviews.Content: Was on vacation when the canon I purchased from Amazon died after two uses. Broken lens motor.Needed a camera for the holiday vacation so I purchased this one and it's been great. Battery is ok I would get a back up to have on hand,

Reviews.Title: takes real sharp and clear pics
Reviews.Author: Dee Dee
Reviews.Content: I am happy with the pictures.  It takes awhile to learn every thing, but all in all a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: CycloneFan
Reviews.Content: Bought this for our daughter. Need to remember to purchase a  SD card too, as this only holds 5 pictures in internal memory.

Reviews.Title: best camera we've ever had.
Reviews.Author: Raymond Roden
Reviews.Content: The camera is very easy to use. It takes extremely good pics. The color is right on and very sharp and clear.

Reviews.Title: My Third Olympus
Reviews.Author: Wolfeboronian
Reviews.Content: My third Olympus, it arrived with a software "hiccup", but has worked well since that first day. If I can keep from dropping my Olympus cameras into the lake, this one may go on for a very long time!Editing: Oops...This VR-340 has acquired another software "hiccup". It's back to working, but my confidence level has plummeted!

Reviews.Title: It broke!!
Reviews.Author: Caitlin Nell Peterson
Reviews.Content: I got it on August 5th and it just broke!! When I'm not using it, I keep it in a drawer so I know I didn't do anything to it. I was recording a video and all of the sudden the screen is flashing and it's frozen. None of the buttons work and it won't turn off.

Reviews.Title: So-so
Reviews.Author: Ariel
Reviews.Content: I am not very experienced with digital cameras and have always just used the camera on my current phone.  So, take that into account when reading this review. I found it very difficult to sift through the plethora of instructions for this camera (downloaded from the Internet). I also found it difficult to determine the correct settings for shooting a pic. There is a "Help" feature on the phone, which helped somewhat.  I made the mistake of not really practicing on this camera before taking it on a European vacation; however, I muddled through and found the camera takes very good pictures, colors are vivid and pictures developed well.I obviously am doing something incorrectly with the shutter speed as I could not snap fast consecutive pictures, which was a real disappointment. I still cannot determine how to do this.Additionally, the battery does not last long and does not make it through a day of sightseeing. I had to use my iPhone camera as a backup many times. The price, however, was excellent.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Dannielle West
Reviews.Content: It works great, and is easy to use.  The pictures are clear and the color is good.  It is a nice small, light size that makes it easy to carry and use.

Reviews.Title: This is a great Camera for the money
Reviews.Author: L Schulz
Reviews.Content: I miss having a viewfinder but the wide screen makes viewing the image you are photographing somewhat less difficult and the ease of use is a plus.

Reviews.Title: I love this Olympus
Reviews.Author: ForeverFriend "ForeverFriend"
Reviews.Content: It's a great little camera!  Very compact and easy to use. It's replacing an older Olympus that got dropped in the ocean.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Keith Frazier
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a good, inexpensive digital camera.  This camera more than met that criteria.  We are pleased with the quality of the pictures & find the camera user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: David A Danis
Reviews.Content: This camera is an outstanding value. It takes terrific pictures and is very easy to use. I really like it.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Frances Faulkenburry
Reviews.Content: I love this camara.  It takes sharp pictures and is easy to use.  I would reccomend it for everyday use as well as travel pictures

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Sarah Ryan
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my grandparents, and they absolutely loved it--easy to use for 78+ year olds; highly recommend--comes with charger and battery!

Reviews.Title: My Second Olympus Point & Shoot (P&S;)
Reviews.Author: gary mckee
Reviews.Content: This is a great purchase for someone ready to move beyond the AUTO shooting mode.  The camera has nice ergonomics, is a tad bulky and has solid construction.  I keep this camera with me all the time for a quick capture and as a backup.  My first Olympus  P&S; was a VG120.  The VR-340 has the quality I expected; great images (zoom is very good for a P&S;), solidly built and excellent video.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Alvin Davis
Reviews.Content: Wonderful Camera at a great low price.  Does so much...too much to mention.  Highly recommend to anyone who wants a inexpensive outlay of cash and get a great quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Easy
Reviews.Author: Randy Yarbrough
Reviews.Content: I'm not your most techno person so I'm glad the camera is easy to use. Right up my alley!  Yea!

Reviews.Title: Great, solid camera if you can get it $50-$75
Reviews.Author: Jason Salmon "travel doc"
Reviews.Content: simple and easy to use with good picture quality and good zoom. Great buy if you're looking for a good camera at a great price  !

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: K. Brown
Reviews.Content: I needed a small camera that I could carry around in my purse and I am more than pleased with this one. The picture quality is great and it's very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Exceeds my expectations.
Reviews.Author: Lev Elbert
Reviews.Content: So far, so good!The pictures are sharp, the colors are vibrant. Even with the biggest zoom I managed to make good shots of birds. Portraits in "beautify" mode are also very good. It softens the picture a little bit and people look younger. I have a black cat (tuxedo) and was able to make its photo. All shades of black are distinctly visible. And white is white.I was really astonished by the ability to make good pictures in the dark. I could not see anything on the screen. Pressed the button, the phone emitted some reddish orange beam, focused and made a short. Considering the conditions the quality is very good.So far I was using only automatic mode. Can't wait to have time and study what else this thing can do.The only thing I'm missing is a viewfinder :(

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Rtackett
Reviews.Content: This camera was a replacement for one lost. and is a better camera and the battery seems to last a very long time. I am able to go through pictures before I need to recharge. The steady hand feature is great for me for close up and distance pictures.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: snake3
Reviews.Content: made my wife happy with this new camera, She likes it's sleek design, great zooming feature, as well as it's weight and size.

Reviews.Title: My new camera
Reviews.Author: Paula Whitten
Reviews.Content: I have never had a good camera so this one is a real treat for me.  I love it and for the price think it's the best deal in town.

Reviews.Title: great features, crisp photos
Reviews.Author: M. Franklin
Reviews.Content: I've been using my camera for a few months now and I love it! The picture quality is way better than the $300 nikon cool pic I purchased 4 years ago. This is a simple model, but the features are what sold me at the end. The beauty feature is my favorite - my girlfriends and I use the heck out of that feature! It takes great video too. I plan on taking this to Europe in a few months (part of the reason I sought out a new camera) and I trust that it won't let me down.

Reviews.Title: Ok for the bargain price
Reviews.Author: James Schlotthauer
Reviews.Content: I have given it a try in all different situations and only moderately satisfied.  It is very difficult to get a clear picture on telephoto without a tripod. I am still trying to figure out how to keep it from flashing on every picture.  It does not compare favorably with my 2 other canons. Color and sharpness are only  fair.

Reviews.Title: disappointed, indoor pictures poor quality!!
Reviews.Author: bec
Reviews.Content: I agree with previous review, I am waiting to send this back, had such high hopes for this camera, my older Kodak1093 take 10 times better pictures than this, and I had to use this during a holiday party, now I will try to edit the pictures so I can send them to people, I am now going to order and try the CannonA400, and hope I get a good camera, nowadays, sometimes you get lucky, sometimes you get a bad camera, that is the way merchandise is made, one never knows, hope for the best.

Reviews.Title: Only for occasional use --You can't be serious
Reviews.Author: Karen Cordaro
Reviews.Content: I take a lot of photographs at family events and for fun and have done so over the years with Canon products.  I am so disappointed in this camera.  The battery life is way too SHORT.  I am going to buy another Canon.  I would only recommend this to someone who is not really serious about photography.

Reviews.Title: It was okay while it lasted
Reviews.Author: V. Acevedo "hungariangirl"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera 6 months ago and it was all fine for the price until it broke. Now I can't take pictures, doesn't do anything, doesn't want to close just keeps beeping when I press the shutter button. I cannot even shut it down. I charged up, I tried taking out the battery, but nothing helped. I cannot take any more pictures and it keeps beeping when I press anything. I don't recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Huge disappointment
Reviews.Author: M. Simpson
Reviews.Content: For me, this has been a very confusing camera to use and I find the quality of the photos are way inferior to my last Panasonic Lumix.  I was spoiled to begin with.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price, basic, some limitations, but good value
Reviews.Author: Bron "Bron"
Reviews.Content: This is a very good budget model point and shoot camera.  It's small, light, and easy to use.  Picture quality is OK to good, perfectly acceptable for the price asked.  You get better than average zoom range and nice wide angle.  The settings are basic compared to more expensive and sophisticated P&S; cameras, but then you did not pay $200-300 for this camera, but less than $100, so fair enough.The camera has more basic features compared to it's expensive brethren, the auto focus sometimes "hunts" and can't find focus, but is fine in most situations.  There are a few nifty features that people have come to expect in this type of P&S; camera (auto mode, face detection, very basic image stabilization, effects, etc.). All in all, it has everything most people will need for a cheap "point and shoot" compact camera.One thing I have not seen mentioned is that it comes with free software that is easily worth $20-30 in itself. The "ib" software handles your basic photo workflow, loading images from your camera, tagging them, and organizing them.  It supports editing, slideshows, video, "Cinemas" --videos (with music) made from your photos, ordering photo books and prints, and so on.  Some features work only with Olympus cameras, but most work with any images from any camera.  If you do not already have software for working with your photos, this software is surprisingly good.  It takes a little time to learn, but is basically well thought out and gets the job done. It is actually much better than most "free" software of this type that I have seen.  I could easily see myself using it with my other cameras (it will automatically load images from SD cards and most cameras once installed, so don't install if you already have a package you like) on PC's where I do not have my expensive photo software licensed and installed.Also included is Olympus Viewer 2, a more basic editing application and upload software package.  It is also decent. Both support Flickr, YouTube, and Facebook.  You get an A/C adapter and USB cable which connect to the camera and the battery charges inside the camera, no stand-alone battery charger.The camera feels like a budget camera (plastic construction), and the controls are basic.  But it handles well and everything works fine.  Images are decent.  Price is right.  Software included is a nice bonus.  Overall it is a good value and I think most will be pleased.  I give it 4 stars for value, decent quality, and performance for the price asked.

Reviews.Title: Best camera for the price
Reviews.Author: littlelisa727
Reviews.Content: I love Olympus cameras I a much bigger one and it wasn't always easy to carry so I wanted a smaller camera and this one takes great pictures and video. Very inexpensive and great quality. I would definitely recommend this camera!!

Reviews.Title: Much Given in a Handy Small Space
Reviews.Author: Larry Weirather
Reviews.Content: Fulfilled the need for something inexpensive, fast, but very compact (as in shirt pocket size) for outdoor and vacation use.

Reviews.Title: Time for my review
Reviews.Author: sharpshooterbabe
Reviews.Content: This is my first ever digital camera that I have ever bought in my life. It was an early christmas present to myself last yr. I bought it & have never had buyers regret. It is amazing! I love the features on it too. Only downside is that the battery doesn't last very long. But I suppose that is all batteries.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: RidingRIo
Reviews.Content: I take it wherever I go and have captured some great shots.  At the beach, on the hiking trails, in my home.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera!
Reviews.Author: E Wally
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for my mom as she was looking for one to take on trips! She took it on a trip to England and Paris and also a couple of other countries. She loves it and uses it all the time. The picture quality is really good and the zoom is good, but if you are looking for something with a better zoom, there is another Olympus with a 24x zoom that might be a better fit.All in all, this camera is great if you are looking for something to take around on trips or on different occasions. Olympus definitely is a great brand for cameras!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: frank umstead "rev"
Reviews.Content: we had bought one and if failed after a few shooting / but my wife loved and Amazon was great on getting our money back / so we bought this one knock on wood this is great / we used it on a family picnic and the pictures turned out greatcon- the battery doesnt last long (100 pictures) so we bought more few more batteries for it / now she happy with it

Reviews.Title: Much more camera than I expected for the price !!
Reviews.Author: Lou Annette Holden
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing! it has so many more features than I expected, I am just blown away! This thing would make an SLR user drool.  I am so anxious to learn how to use all the special features. Just the point and shoot pictures I've taken have been amazing. I am so very glad  the company my old camera was from, stopped supporting that model, which forced me into the market for a new one. I'm an Olympus fan from now on.

Reviews.Title: The Olympus VR-340 is a Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Rhonda Friedrich
Reviews.Content: at a great price! Gorgeous shots, long lasting battery life and so easy to use it's nearly point-and-click. This is the first camera that I've been successful in using panoramic option. Having the instructions on-board as opposed to some thick little booklet to paw through is helping me get the most out of this unit.

Reviews.Title: love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: whitneym
Reviews.Content: I love it...i got it a day early takes great pics...well worth the money....i would say so far the best cam i have had

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Eric W. Greer "E from OH"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price. My eight year old daughter bought this and she loves it! It is very easy for her to use and she loves the purple color. I am very impressed with the quality for the price that she paid for it. I would recommend it for anyone.

Reviews.Title: great camera for a small price
Reviews.Author: Mature Reader "Mary"
Reviews.Content: this camera is compact and very easy to use; i bought this to replace a much older Olympus camera (still working) and it was very easy to make the transition.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Miz Beverly
Reviews.Content: Perfect size and very light weight. Clear pictures and very easy to use. It is also easy to  charge the battery

Reviews.Title: Best in lots of sunlight.
Reviews.Author: K. Bennick "lover of fanciful things and good...
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a compact camera to take to me on a 13 city tour of the UK and norther Europe. I didn't really understand how to best use it until Paris, which was my last stop. I found that I had to overcompensate for exposure to achieve the best photos. If it's overcast or in-doors you won't get very printable shots out of it. The best, most crisp, and zoom-in worthy shots were when there was LOTS of sun. That said, it did take some beautiful shots with lots of contrast. I got some really great photos out of this from my trip, but I can't help but wish that, while more cumbersome, I would have just taken my Nikon D-SLR.You might ask why I didn't, if I had one available to me. The issue was to save space. I was traveling with one suitcase and one carry-on. I couldn't squeeze in a large camera with alternating lenses. If I had really had the time to figure out how best to use this camera, I feel I would be happier with it.

Reviews.Title: Cool!
Reviews.Author: Mary Wright
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly.  Works great!  Easy to use, takes great pics!  Love how I can post pics directly to Facebook from the program!

Reviews.Title: Sweet Cam
Reviews.Author: ToughCustomer86
Reviews.Content: Everything one would ever need in a camera for non-professionals. No complaints at all. Shoots 720p video and sound, 4k pics no problem.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: hip112778
Reviews.Content: Camera is all I expected and more. Still learning all the little nuances this little gem has for use. 10X zoom is also a huge plus !

Reviews.Title: Best small camera for the money!
Reviews.Author: Paul E. Witt
Reviews.Content: Great deal !  Best viewing screen, pixels, and zoom for under 100 bucks.  Can't go wrong buying this one !

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Angella Goble
Reviews.Content: Its a pretty pinkish purple, it has a wonderfully big view screen and it has a lot of zoom for the price!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: David Swan
Reviews.Content: Great camera, perfect condition. We feel that we've finally gotten the perfect camera for what we were in need of and looking for.

Reviews.Title: bought and given as a gift
Reviews.Author: haroldgjr
Reviews.Content: My wife loves the camera and I gave it to her. Winner, MEShe is not a techie and has not asked me a single question about how to use it and is very happy with the results.Not a single complaint, Winner, Me!

Reviews.Title: Red Olympus
Reviews.Author: L. Allis
Reviews.Content: What a nice little camera, actually shirt-pocket size at last. Everything seems nicely fitted and finished.My open-box one included the battery, a charger, two cables (1 for charger and data transfer; and 1 for composite TV).  They include the useless CD that comes with these things. There's a strong grey wrist strap.  All was in excellent shape, except for one crushed corner of the outer box that made no difference.The sole nasty thing about it is that its cables use a proprietary plug.  I would not have ordered, had I realized.  THESE ARE NOT NORMAL USB CABLES! If you forget to take one along, you will seldom be able to borrow one.  If you lose it, you may have to root round the web trying to order from Olympus at a high price. An annoying and silly design decision. Maybe later Olympus models have corrected it.Otherwise, the camera works immediately, looks and feels like a high grade item. I feel certain it will do for my (low) requirements. First trials make it seem easily usable. The huge 10X range of available zoom feels luxurious.Spare batteries look reasonable in cost.

Reviews.Title: gorgeus!!!!!
Reviews.Author: juanchaka
Reviews.Content: I bougth this camera for my mom, it is so easy to use, i recomend if you want to order it, buy a sd memory

Reviews.Title: Decent results for low cost
Reviews.Author: Shirley Harris
Reviews.Content: I have been using this camera for over a month now, taking more than 800 photos, both outside and indoors, in varying lighting situations.  I am an amateur photographer of the nature found in my yard, relying on the autofocus and point-and-shoot capabilities of two other digital long zoom cameras (Olympus C740 and Canon Power Shot SX30).  I puchased this camera for a light, pocketable option for my hiking trips.  The Olympus VR-340 camera is surprisingly good for the cost!  I have taken comparable shots with each of the cameras, and find some differences in fuzziness (noise) with this camera -- this seems to be poorer under lower lighting conditions.  However, I am quite pleased with the overall results, especially under bright light conditions.  (I could always use a longer zoom lens, but nothing beats this price.)  I have been able to capture a lot of detail in close ups of tree bark and animals tracks in snow, birds at the feeder and in nearby trees, plus amazing close ups of the far shoreline of a local pond.  I am satisfied with this for now.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Bruce Klein
Reviews.Content: This camera has more features and better specs than you would think for the money.I have been very pleased with how easy the camera is to use and the quality of the pictures.I received the camera in 3 days and in perfect condition so I am also very happy with the seller.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: deysis possamai
Reviews.Content: It is a very good cameraPhotos have good clarity both day and nightI recommend it for any trip whether it's a water ride where you can buy a cover to protect it and it works great

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Diana Harmon
Reviews.Content: This is a new digital camera for me. I bought it to travel to Italy. The pictures were sharp and clear. I had no problems using it. I am not a professional, but as an amateur, this worked great! It has many features I have not tried yet.

Reviews.Title: The Only Thing My...
Reviews.Author: NYpudge
Reviews.Content: ...daughter asked for for her 6th birthday was this camera, and now she can't stop taking pictures and videos.  We had to buy her a 32G card so she could document every. single. thing. she. does.Seriously though, I've used it on a few occasions and the features are awesome.  Take black and white, sepia, silly photos...it's a rad cam.

Reviews.Title: Discovered the solution - problems with repairs
Reviews.Author: Ravenhill
Reviews.Content: I like these cameras and have more than one, as I must take 200 pictures a day in my job as a Dog Vacay host. (They are sent to the sent to dogs' families at least once a day if not more often). I have 2 so if the battery needs charging, I don't miss any cuteness.The one design flaw on this camera, in my opinion, was that the door to the battery/memory compartment is plastic, and flimsy, and the pressure from the sim card or battery can cause it to bow, sometimes causing the camera to turn itself off, reset, or malfunction.I learned to take pictures holding it shut with my thumb.Only recently, I realized that the fault may be mine. The battery is held in place by a little plastic catch. The sim card, although it does not have a visible catch, WILL lock in place if one pushes it gently down. Just push down carefully and you can hear a little click.Now I don't know what to do with my thumb!Mainly posting in case anyone like me hurries and has this problem, which is really a non-problem.To see examples of the kinds of photo, you can always look at the Facebook page called Ravenhill. I use several settings, including party, sports, food, and pets.UPDATE 2014The two cameras sadly have somehow "hit a wall" and now break frequently. They are covered by manufacturer's warranty. One can send them in for repair.Notes on that process:1. If you pay to ship them, there are seperate steps you must take to be reimbursed, and it won't be soon.2. Once you send them, you should check on their progress. I sent one and it sat in some kind of limbo for over a month. Expecting it back any day for weeks, I went to check the status and it said "More information needed". They don't let you KNOW they need more information. Just let it sit, more or less forever.3. Each time, you have to send in proof of purchase. When I sent in one of the cameras for the third time, it got stuck in limbo waiting for proof of purchase, which I had already provided twice before. When I called on the phone and pointed this out, they said not to worry, and went on with the process.4. They don't really care about your experience. After sending a camera in 3 times, and it breaking again less than 24 hours after repair #2 and two days after repair #3, their "solution" continues to be the exact same form letter telling me to send it in for repairs....same one I used the first time. Mind you, this is happening with not one, but both cameras.Okay for about a year, then an assortment of issues, usually to do with lens retraction and/or the LCD screen.Cameras not bad, but the whole repair thing is a drag. They honor their warranty, but only seem to do the bare minimum. I think they just clean, and have never actually replaced any of the parts involved. I can hardly believe this thing about repairing the same camera over and over can be cost effective.This week, silver camera is dead and red camera has developed a black dot inside the lens housing, right near the center of the screen. since I really can't be without both, I am shooting around the black spot. Sometimes I can place it over black things, sometimes I can crop it. Crying, "Out! Out, damned spot!" has not worked. It's like a new challenge....as if it is not hard enough to get good pictures. Anyway, I really like the cameras. Will probably just buy a third one and hope for the best, because I have not really found anything comparable with similar reviews and features.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money!
Reviews.Author: Frena Gray-Davidson
Reviews.Content: I like the actual camera, tho. the instructions for using it are poor and often totally obscure. It's twice as good at scenery shots as my Bloggie, but i need the next stage camera up with more powerful zoom. i'm really enjoying this tho..

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Terri Elzey
Reviews.Content: This camera is great, takes awesome clear pictures. I use this camera daily in my work and it is very fast on picture taking.

Reviews.Title: Olympus camera
Reviews.Author: Carole Kalogirou "Carole"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to use for work functions and have been extremely pleased with how easy this camera is to work, as well as, the quality of pictures it takes.  I am not sure if it was stated in the product specifications, but this camera has some cool features on it, such as, Beauty Fix.  Every picture I have taken, I have gone in and applied the different beauty fixes....and everyone comes out looking just awesome!!  What used to be an annoying task of getting people to let me take their pictures has now turned into a fun event as they want to see what I can do to make them look like a "celebrity".  I have even touched up some of my guys and though they won't admit it, they always give me the okay to do the "fixed up" picture of themselves...lol!  The quality of the pictures are so good, that I have everyone wanting to go buy this camera for their own usage and the price is sooooo affordable, it's silly to pay more for any other camera.

Reviews.Title: Not the best but good for the money.
Reviews.Author: Scooter freak
Reviews.Content: Not the best but good for the money. Colors are accurate and the 10x zoom is very nice. Buy better if you want to enlarge your pictures.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: william a billings
Reviews.Content: Just point and shoot and I like being able to charge the battery instead of buying new ones and love the zoom.

Reviews.Title: Excellent automatic camera
Reviews.Author: Flash
Reviews.Content: This camera has performed very well, but as with most digital cameras, the menu system leaves a lot to be desired.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: terrye
Reviews.Content: The price was unbeatable for the performance this camera offers. Takes wonderful pictures. The color I probably wouldn't have chosen but I did save over $20.00 and that was worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great price
Reviews.Author: L.B.
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a Christmas gift for our daughter.  Very user friendly with great features. High quality camera at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: VR 340
Reviews.Author: Donald Gardner "DCG"
Reviews.Content: This camera was bought as a replacement for a damaged VR 320. It is obviously a cheaper made product and not as user friendly. Still, for the price, it is a very good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a great price.
Reviews.Author: John in FL
Reviews.Content: Camera has everything we wanted, functions great, and is priced right.  Camera is easy to use, has all the common bells and whistles expected of a point and shoot, and is pocket sized.  This is the third Olympus camera my household has owned and I will continue to be an Olympus customer.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Sherry L Herzog
Reviews.Content: Very Nice Camera.  I use a Camera Very Frequently and have in the past bought other brands, well I came back to Olympus and this Camera I am very pleased with.  Easy to use, Takes nice pictures.  I got a great Price and Very Very fast shipping.

Reviews.Title: good quality images
Reviews.Author: Caminante583
Reviews.Content: It is a great product, i found it in a good Price so i’m satisfied, its perfect for what i wanted, i know that this product would be as i imagined but its better. grat zooooooooooooooom

Reviews.Title: Love my new camera
Reviews.Author: JWharton
Reviews.Content: The Camera arrived in perfect condition and seems to work perfectly.  I am looking forward to using this on my upcoming travels.

Reviews.Title: Olympus
Reviews.Author: arllene Loehrke
Reviews.Content: Have had olympus for many years and why change if you are satisfied for years.Is it involved to fix a camera that has been dropped?  Expensive or should I discard it?

Reviews.Title: Olympus VR-340 16MP camera
Reviews.Author: Edward  Mueller, Jr., L
Reviews.Content: An amazing little camera.  Well built.  Nice finish.  Feels secure in my hand thanks to the convenient little finger grip built into the front of the camera.  Great for one hand operation.  Can't buy a better camera for the money (about $78.oo) and it has a 10x zoom.  Looks like Olympus is discontinuing this handy-dandy little model, though.  Another neat feature -- thanks to Olympus' thinking is the camera battery is used in other Olympus cameras, including the vr-360, vr-470, sz-12 and sp720-uz.  Each model offers different features and some make excellent complementary pairs.

Reviews.Title: Okay for some things
Reviews.Author: G. County
Reviews.Content: I had a Canon before this camera. It hold to long before snapping and picture is not as crisp as with other cameras. I will hand this one down to my daughter and get another Canon.

Reviews.Title: good price
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: this is was also a  buy for my friend she doesn;t have amazon account so i ordered it for her but i belive she like it and she liked the price...

Reviews.Title: Nice Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Larry Johnson
Reviews.Content: Does what I want when I don't want to carry my SLR1. Focus easily even when zoomed.2. VG quality pics3. Good response time between pics so don't miss next shotOnly negatives are that battery could stay charged longer & don't care about plugging in whole camera to recharge battery.

Reviews.Title: Excellent pix for a point-and-shoot.
Reviews.Author: RitaRita
Reviews.Content: I am still learning how to use it. I bought an Olympus because it is small, has lots of features, and the brand has a solid reputation. The optics are very good; the camera is easy to operate. It is not too heavy which I appreciate as it is something I like to take along in my purse. The battery charges quickly and holds the charge for lots of picture taking.

Reviews.Title: SIMPLE
Reviews.Author: tsr
Reviews.Content: Works and sets up quick and easily, takes great pics and clear Videos. Also my wife loves the 3 inch screen to show all her grandkids pictures to all her friends she meets quickly and easily.

Reviews.Title: Olympus, the best cameras.
Reviews.Author: johanne cayer
Reviews.Content: I have had several different cameras in my 61 years, and by far this is one of the best I have bought. Thanks  Johanne

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Kim Bush
Reviews.Content: Not good at night at a distance.  Good at night with flash up close.  I love the size.  I don't really have any more to say.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera.
Reviews.Author: thatguydowntheroad
Reviews.Content: I was stoked when this camera came. I didn't know a lot about how to use cameras, with control of ISO and how shutter speed worked. It took a while, but i figured it out. Great camera, I bought this camera and then ended up upgrading again, so i haven't used it a ton. The ISO is pretty sensitive, and can make a lot of noise in the picture.

Reviews.Title: Sweet and easy to find when I lay it down.
Reviews.Author: Joyce Digges
Reviews.Content: So far I am very pleased with the pictures I have taken with this camera.  They come out sharp.  Truly like the design.

Reviews.Title: Great zoom!
Reviews.Author: Linda Lee "Linda"
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use.  I love the zoom.  Great price!  The photos are not quite as good as my old Nikon, but the price was better.  The Nikon didn't last long.  We'll see how this one holds up.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, good value
Reviews.Author: Drew Hayes
Reviews.Content: The camera is just the right size and takes great pictures.  Great zoom lens.  Easy to upload pictures and to recharge.  Only drawback is that the memory card keeps un-formatting, causing me to lose some of those great pictures, but I'm not sure if the issue is with the camera or the memory card itself.  Good bang for buck.

Reviews.Title: point and shoot and more
Reviews.Author: sebastian barran "a templar at heart"
Reviews.Content: I use this camera in the OR and it takes great pics even with someone who is unfamiliar with it ie the point shoot part is easy to usebut can change iso time etc

Reviews.Title: good quality
Reviews.Author: Frances J. Conway "swissms"
Reviews.Content: I do love this camera and am still learning more and more about it.  I am one who takes my camera everywhere and this is ideal!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Leecifer "Leecifer"
Reviews.Content: This Olympus VR-340 camera is easy to use and has lots of features.  I'm not a photography enthusiast so I have mine set to automatically select the best "scene" setting for each shot, and that seems to work just fine.  With 16 megapixel pictures and 10x optical zoom (31x digital zoom), you can't beat the price.My previous camera was also an Olympus and that one only lasted 3 years and then it died on me.  I've only had this one for a few months so I can't give it 5 stars because I don't know whether or not I will have a similar longevity problem.  For this price I felt it was worth giving Olympus another shot.

Reviews.Title: Olympus VR-340
Reviews.Author: D. Barchi
Reviews.Content: It works fine - when it works.  When it doesn't work, neither the seller, nor the mfgr. would take any responsibility for getting it right.Only Amazon was kind enough to give me a discount on my next  purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Stacey
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera.  I wasn't too sure about the picture quality until I looked at the pictures on my computer monitor.  Beautiful.  Fairly easy menu to use also.

Reviews.Title: I like this Camera, But...
Reviews.Author: Samuel L Freeman
Reviews.Content: This camera is very is easy to use and takes great daytime pictures, but night pictures are a little blurry especially outdoor pics.  I bought this camera to take with me hiking and it will be fine for that.  I would be a little more disappointed if I were using it primarily for indoor or night pictures.  I wouldn't trade it for my Olympus E-PL1.  Oveall, this camera works fine for what I need it for.

Reviews.Title: Replacing an older Nikon Coolpix 4300
Reviews.Author: Bob Wright
Reviews.Content: Bought a Nikon Coolpix 4300 several years ago for a lot more money than this camera cost, and this one is much better. technology advancement is great. Really like to 2 level close up mode. That is what I bought it for, and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: bookworm
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, it takes great pictures and has great instructions on the cd that are easy to understand.  There is even a help menu on the camera, if you forget how to do some things.  I like the 10x zoom also.  I am going to take wonderful pictures of my new grandson!

Reviews.Title: Excelente product
Reviews.Author: Walter
Reviews.Content: I liked a lot the camera, excelent quality, fast shipping, good good deal. camera recommended, if you only need a nice camera easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Chris A. Baker
Reviews.Content: I love all the options for a great price. My old camera didn't have a large LCD display. So lightweight and easy to carry. Would recommend a good carrying case for any camera. I use it mainly for hunting purposes.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying this camera
Reviews.Author: Carotie
Reviews.Content: I would buy this again.  I have a Sony DSC-H9, which I like but wanted something smaller and quicker.  The Olympus VR-340  is small and takes quicker pictures.  I would buy this again.  Have only had it a short time, but really like it.

Reviews.Title: Great pocket or bag camera!!
Reviews.Author: B. Barber "dad-of-3"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera to throw in my bag and have when those unexpected times come up and I don't have my Nikon with me. It doesn't compare to my dslr camera, but for the price this is a great addition!!! I love the camera affects and the beauty fix is really too cool. I do wish it had the S and A modes, but for the price it's fine. I can take this places I don't risk my better camera and don't have to worry. I'm happy!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for someone else.  I would give it five stars, but the buttons are just a little small for an older person to use, however, it takes great pics, and is a wonderful point and shoot camera. Great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: An Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Lorraine Fay
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for Christmas for my creative eleven year old daughter. She loves the camera, and it has exceeded our expectations. The various selections to change the appearance of photos are fun features, and the color is beautiful and sharp. The 10X zoom is great for a camera of this price, and I would recommend this camera to anyone who enjoys taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera !
Reviews.Author: coolmomx2
Reviews.Content: This camera takes wonderful, crisp, clear pictures even in low light situations.Also takes great action shots. It captured my kids mid air while jumping.I've never owned a camera that could do that and I've owned Nikon,Fuji,Kodak and samsung camera's.This camera looks great (own the white) and looks much more expensive than it is.It feels sturdy and well made.It was a gift to me and it's so nice the person that bought it for me would like one of their own.It was bought from Beach Camera and came in a package deal with almost everything a person could need to go with the camera.Order one you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: This is a great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Dorothymarie Dickey
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, crisp clear photos, great 10x zoom....just the best!  I would buy it again for a gift.  And I purchased the red color which is really pretty.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for....
Reviews.Author: E.T.
Reviews.Content: I decided to take my son's senior pictures myself, but wanted higher megapixels. The pictures were outstanding, and many, many people thought I had taken him to a professional photographer. The different special effects are really cool as well. This is my third Olympus camera, and I have been extremely pleased with all of them.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for taking pictures of Kids.
Reviews.Author: fromthedesert
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a wonderful camera.  I have been through many digital cameras looking for one that had a short "Click to capture" response time.  This is the best I found.  Yes, I probably could have found one which was quicker for more money, but I wasn't willing to go over a certain price point.  After all, when a camera is around children, do you really want to invest big bucks?In addition, this camera is really user friendly.  It is super easy to use (once I figured it out) on the fly and captures most of the fast moving pictures (kids hate to pose).  The zoom is great, just enough.  The size of the camera is perfect, good for holding steady, the buttons are easily accessed.  My last camera was smaller (a Kodak) and I had problems pushing tiny buttons completely down without jiggling the camera.  This is not to say this camera is huge, because it definitely is not (Still fits in my pocket), but it fits nicely in my hand.  All in all, this is a wonderful camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice quality over all. The image settings could use some help.
Reviews.Author: John E. Clark "Twelve Foot Guru"
Reviews.Content: I am please with the camera overall. I need to play a bit more with the image settings. The flash tends to wash out everything on the indoor setting. The oddly named "food" setting seems to work well for close up work. The video quality is good for outside work or very well lit indoor situations. I would have preferred an actual view finder as well as the LCD screen. Framing a shot at arms length with an LCD screen is a bit more difficult. However, these issues aside, this is a good camera for the price range.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera so that I could become more familiar with Olympus products.  I am NOT disappointed!  It's a solidly built camera with many functions.  Excellent low light picture quality.  The automatic settings are great!  I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone looking for a point and shoot.  It is a bit larger than some point-and-shoot cameras, but still fits easily inside a pocket.  Very easy upload of pictures to the computer as well.

Reviews.Title: Really great camera
Reviews.Author: Shopper
Reviews.Content: The value of this camera is amazing!  I am not any kind of great photographer, we just take pictures of family, vacations, etc.  And this little camera is amazing for that.  We haven't had a ton of use yet, but it seems to do the trick.  The price is right, and the camera is beautiful!  I love the pearl white.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera simply because our was very old by technology standards.  My husband was so impressed with the pictures we took on our Harley trip out west.  Nomally the pictures that I take get deleted but not on this camera!  Even I was impressed with the pictures this camera took with me at the wheel!  I would recommend this camera to anybody that was looking for one to take on vacations!!  Couldn't be happier!!!!

Reviews.Title: Optical zoom disappointing
Reviews.Author: M. Kamplain
Reviews.Content: 10X zoom didn't do much on this camera.  I sent it back for something that would do a better job of pulling in far away items.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: JoAnn Masche-Daane
Reviews.Content: Works great, is very compact and takes awesome pictures.  The price is right and the battery lasts a long time without charging.  Very happy with this new camera.

Reviews.Title: 16mp pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Chris Orear
Reviews.Content: Great little pocket camera with a decent zoom.  Fits in your pocket and holda a charge very well,  love it

Reviews.Title: Except for...
Reviews.Author: Ann L. Mauzy
Reviews.Content: The instructions say to put the battery in backwards. Frustrating! The battery door opens itself when it should be closed.

Reviews.Title: Point and Shoot! Yeah!
Reviews.Author: M. Liffengren "Mattlee Crew"
Reviews.Content: We previously had a Nikkon Point and Shoot that died on us after only 1 year of use (Literally about 1 week after the one-year warranty was up - go figure).The Quality of this Olympus is fantastic. Bought the Square Trade 3-Year Camera Warranty this time around.Matt L.

Reviews.Title: Not very sturdy
Reviews.Author: Regina
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for our work place.  We use it to tale photos of our patients ( if allowed ).  After 1 week of use, the lens became loose, crooked  and would not close.  We were not easy on this camera, but it was not overly abused either.

Reviews.Title: olympus vr 340
Reviews.Author: LLMON
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera from electronics basket may 29th 2013. I read the reviews and it sounded like a great little camera. It arrived about 2 weeks later. When I charged it, it took over 48 hours. I went to use it a few days later and the charge was already gone. I thought I may have done something wrong, so I tried it again, same thing. Contacted Olympus they sent a new battery but the problem is still there. Not happy with the product. I've used it about three times, when I can use it. The problem now is that it's over the 30 days. They want me to send the camera for repairs. I don't want the camera. Asked if I could get a credit for a different camera. They will not do that... Contacted electronics basket, they are refusing to help me too. So, I guess it is buyer beware and poor customer service!!! Very dissatisfied with the product and customer service.

Reviews.Title: Not too impressed
Reviews.Author: Kate Tennant
Reviews.Content: I can't take a clear picture with this camera, no matter what the setting.  I'll stick with Canon, I guess.

Reviews.Title: pretty good camera
Reviews.Author: reader
Reviews.Content: pretty good camera- it does have some difficulty focusing in on objects when zoom is in use- that could be because I haven't read the manual yet and could be doing it wrong.  Very easy to use.  I am enjoying this camera!~

Reviews.Title: awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: bookworm
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, easy to use and gives me very clear images, nice pocket size, elegant pearl white colour, I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Linda Ramsey
Reviews.Content: Works very well. I have to read more of the manual. It performs very well and has a lot of options.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kim Barton
Reviews.Content: this suits our company's purpose. We use it to document restoration work. Simple to use, easy to load onto computers.

Reviews.Title: Great Pics!!
Reviews.Author: Glendys
Reviews.Content: Great resolution and flash! beautiful design!  Good pics in the darkness :) I bough it purple! I wanted a pretty camera :)

Reviews.Title: Olympus VR-340 16MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom (Red)
Reviews.Author: Osiris Vilchez
Reviews.Content: all I can say is that I got what I expected to get,... love my camera, easy to use, and will use it on my next vacations, maybe i will post an update.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera with some fun features, but the shipping is a bit questionable...
Reviews.Author: Paula H
Reviews.Content: Nice camera for a good price. It shoots good quality pictures & has some great, fun little features- like fish-eye, line drawing and pop art filters. I just got it a few days ago, so I don't know about long-term reliability, but so far it has given nice results in many different lighting situations. As for the shipping, this was the first time I've had any problems with Amazon/UPS, but this shipment arrived in an open box. The cardboard was totally un-taped and just wrapped around the 2 items. It did arrive on time and with no problems other than being filthy from (most likely) rolling around on the floor of the truck.

Reviews.Title: Loaded with features
Reviews.Author: Jorge Santiago
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased strictly for non-critical snapshots and for ease of transport.  It packs a lot a features for the price, and the 10x zoom in a pocket camera is very impressive.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Scott Alan Smith
Reviews.Content: This camera is fairly easy to use and takes very good pictures. It is easy to carry around, because it fits easily in pants pockets or a small pouch in a back pack.  The 10x zoom is great.  We used the camera at Disney and got some great close-ups of animals, cast members, and buildings which you couldn't get close to.  Some of the pictures we took came out fuzzy.  I have not figured out yet how to get a good focus on moving objects.  However, we took pictures from bumpy rides which came out in perfect focus.  The sparkle feature did not work nearly as well as we had hoped. When you use this feature, you must change the setting from "auto" to "beauty" and turn off the flash. Overall, this camera is very good for non-professionals, and I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great quality
Reviews.Author: David C. Dayhoff
Reviews.Content: Got this camera because our last one was extremely cheap.  I think this is really a good camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic! Cheap Camera Just As Good As Expensive
Reviews.Author: Caitie
Reviews.Content: I did not expect this camera, being that I only paid like 80 for it, to be as fantastic as it is! It's very easy to use, lightweight and very small. I love it :) If i had to complain about one thing it would be a stretch. The only thing I'm not 100% fond of is the button layout but it works fine for me. Very happy with my purchase :)

Reviews.Title: muy buena camara
Reviews.Author: Frank Teran
Reviews.Content: Este es un  producto excelente; de muy buena calidad,  y recomendado 100 %, el envío rápido y seguro todo bien,

Reviews.Title: Olympus VR-340 16 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Kayaker
