Reviews.Content: I just ordered this camera 1 week ago and am so very pleased so far. Unfortunately, my Cannon Elphwas dropped on the kitchen floor and the shutter would not close itself. Upon being told by a camerastore that it would cost @ $120 to fix, I then decided it was worth the $ to purchase a new one. So Iwent online to Amazon and found the perfect camera after browsing quite a few models. The Olympusappealed to me since it seemed easy to use, especially since I'm not all that tech savy with cameras.I chose the purple color since I've never owned 1 that color..usually silver, black...and love it. The picsthat I have taken & reviewed so far look great. Once they are developed, I will definitely know for sure.But for now, very happy with this choice of Olmpus VR-340 as well as the price & would def recommendit.

Reviews.Title: best camera for the money!!! for sure I will be back for more stuff...
Reviews.Author: deanna
Reviews.Content: SUPER AWESOME, GREAT PRICE, I LOVE YOU!!!and with christmas coming, I will return to buy more stuff... FOR SURE!!

Reviews.Title: Great item!
Reviews.Author: S. Riehl
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I ordered, would buy again! This is a great product for the price! Would recommend to purchase again.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: this camera is the best, fits in your pocket, and point and shoot all very fast and that its on is very fast, day or night, I love it, especially because my professional camera I can not carry everywhere and is very complicated because it is very large attachments to this camera difererencia in problem solving walk in the street of a city

Reviews.Title: Handy
Reviews.Author: Dustbunny
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough nice things about this little pocket camera. It's lightweight. The zoom is awesome. The icons are fairly easy enough and the cool features are fun. Of course most people have all this on their phones and aps but not me. I still carry my camera and I like this one alot.

Reviews.Title: Returned
Reviews.Author: S
Reviews.Content: We returned this camera because the picture quality was a bit grainy and not nearly as good as our old Olympus Stylus.  Also, the camera body is plastic, contrary to what some other reviews state.

Reviews.Title: everything is a okay
Reviews.Author: Branford andrews
Reviews.Content: I am loving itIt is just what I wantedNo dislike everything is a okayFamily, friends and business people

Reviews.Title: Great quality.
Reviews.Author: JW
Reviews.Content: I did not know much about this camera, but I have owned an Olympus before and loved it. This camera did not disappoint. It takes great quality photos and is very easy to handle. Battery life is good, although I will probably order a spare.

Reviews.Title: excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Javier Poll
Reviews.Content: It is a very good digital camera for those who like to go out for a walk and always take photos for memories, I chose this rate because I think that is a responsible company

Reviews.Title: Just what I expected, super fast shipping.
Reviews.Author: Lisa fRANCIS
Reviews.Content: Came with great speed and was exactly what the add said it was. Haven't used it much yet.Love the zoom on it. Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Olympus VR-340 digital camera
Reviews.Author: millerbe
Reviews.Content: Haven't really used it yet, just tried a few pics briefly.  Had a nice download for instructions but I found some lacking.Fortunately, from using my old camera, I think I can figure it out.  I will be anticipating a download of some trip pics coming up.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Georgia
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice camera and it was in a reasonable price. The video is ok but the pictures are very good.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera at great price
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my daughter for Christmas.  It is a great little camera that takes really nice photos with lots of options.  We will be borrowing it for some of our work photos.10/2013 Update:  My daughter has been using this camera for 10 months now.  She and her friends are constantly making videos and stop motion movies.  After several thousand photos (yes that's correct), and being used by 9 and 10 year olds, the camera is none the worse for wear.  Still takes great photos and nothing has broken.

Reviews.Title: Best camera for the money!!!!!
Reviews.Author: jesse
Reviews.Content: i just received this camera today. it is a very user freandly camera. i am very experienced in Film photography. this camera is the best!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Really nice camera for the price! Easy to use and takes nice pictures :)
Reviews.Author: Tamara Sass
Reviews.Content: Really easy to use camera.. the price cannot be beat. I love that it is simple and the color is fun!

Reviews.Title: Great improvement over our old (5 yr) HP camera
Reviews.Author: MTwoK
Reviews.Content: Quick power-up and fast response for pictures. This is compared to our older HP camera, so perhaps there are faster in it's class of current models. Resulting pictures were clear and color was good. Happy so far!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Chloe
Reviews.Content: A present for my daughter--she loved it!!!  Great color, works wonderful, and the best price we could find for a quality camera. Love it!

Reviews.Title: great camera upgrade for me
Reviews.Author: M. Bonebrake
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to operate, easy to carry and takes very nice pictures.  I love the ease of the zoom button and I have just started discovering all the features.  Great battery life also.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera, great value!!!!
Reviews.Author: oceansoulsurfer91
Reviews.Content: This camera is very user friendly. It took me no time to learn how to use it. It takes beautiful pictures. I highly recommend this camera!!!

Reviews.Title: Just Open
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Connor
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my niece graduation for June 4. I gave it to her on Tuesday, and it does not work. It will not open to take a picture. If you order this, please see if it works. Now it is pass the return day.

Reviews.Title: bad dealer
Reviews.Author: Zaidoun Sweidan
Reviews.Content: unfortunately i was purchase this camera from one of the dealer and i bought it new but when i receive it its used once with scratches and not working and even the box it show that it is used one, and when contact the dealer he told me that he send me a new one but maybe it’s not working because a damage through delivery, but am sure that not the truth because the package is well cover with bubble one and the camera box show that its open and the camera shown there's a scratches by using ,, really i will not recomend any one to use this supplier

Reviews.Title: Bad choice for me.
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Papert
Reviews.Content: Had to return it.  On/off switch was sticking.  Pictures were blurry. My sister has one and loves her.  Not for me.

Reviews.Title: SATISFIED CUSTOMER
Reviews.Author: Diaanna M. Helbert
Reviews.Content: I'M USING THE BASIC FUNCTIONS NOW AND WILL LEARN MORE LATER. i'M SATISFIED WITH THE CAMERA AND GLAD MY FRIEND SUGGESTED IT.

Reviews.Title: easy access
Reviews.Author: dn
Reviews.Content: easy to use and manipulate, i like the ability to change the different settings of view mode. reasonable size and weight.

Reviews.Title: GREAT pictures!
Reviews.Author: K. Russell
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a replacement for my Olympus FE 340 which had suddenly developed the notorious lens malfunction, hoping this model is an improvement in durability. I haven't taken a lot of pictures yet, maybe 30, but they've come out great. Even when enlarging many times the images are crisp. The controls are different from my previous model, no idea why Olympus did this as it has to confuse the daylights out of those of us who have gotten used to our old cameras. The camera has a large built in library as a guide to help the confusion though.

Reviews.Title: Olympus
Reviews.Author: Allan Hawkins V
Reviews.Content: I don't understand why you have to made cheap cameras, I mean, I'm talking about Oly or not? They said 16mp but pictures seems to be 8mp, forget a good image stabilization, forget auto-rotate, forget taking pictures at 10x (you only will get blurr images & forget digital zoom too). Battery is a long last battery. If you need a good back-up, this is it.

Reviews.Title: got it as a cheap camera to use as a second camera
Reviews.Author: shocked parent
Reviews.Content: didn't get to use it even twice.  The Charger never seemed like it really fit I would always have to try super hard to get it to connect and then to get it to charge took forever would leave it over night.We used it for 1 trip and it took okay pictures the first day we forgot to use it the second day.when I pulled it out for the second trip the lens was partway open and would not retract.  I tried recharging it and it would take a charge or turn on.I wanted a cheap second camera but not a cheap pile of stinky.  At least I got all my money back when I returned it.

Reviews.Title: not what I expected!
Reviews.Author: Brandy Stockman
Reviews.Content: I wanted a small handheld camera that I could use for pictures and digital video.  After a lot of research I decided to get this one.  The camera took great pictures but I wanted a 10x zoom for video and you can't zoom while using the video feature which is why I bought this camera.  I returned it after trying it!  No where in the explanation of the item does it say that you can't zoom while recording a video.  Apparently none of these handheld camera's can zoom while recording:(.  I now know I need a hand held camcorder that takes pictures.  Be aware of this before you buy it!  Also, I couldn't see a thing when taking pictures in sunlight.  The screen had so much glare I felt blind!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa M. Barthelme "Lisa G"
Reviews.Content: I am by no means a photographer, but I love this camera so far. It does exactly what I want it to do, and I am sure there are many more features that I will love once I learn how to use them. If you are not a professional, this camera is very easy to use right out of the box!

Reviews.Title: VR-340
Reviews.Author: Nko Gonzalvis
Reviews.Content: It is a good camera for the price. I think anyone that is looking for a good point and shoot camera between $100-200 will be satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Value Shopper
Reviews.Author: Conservative Shopper
Reviews.Content: Haven't used this camera much but what I have viewed, i am very pleased with everything. . .I'm still trying to learn some of the features this camera has.

Reviews.Title: A good camera
Reviews.Author: Keith
Reviews.Content: It is a good camera for the price but don't expect it do more than what is says it can do under the specifications.  I think anyone that is looking for a good point and shoot camera between $100-200 will be satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great camera when it is not damaged
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: The camera was damaged when it arrived.  Other than that, it is a great camera but I will order the 5x Optical Zoom camera the next time.

Reviews.Title: Standard point and shoot.
Reviews.Author: emilio
Reviews.Content: Only a point and shoot camera for the student or kids or grand parents that are not in to photography.

Reviews.Title: i just love it
Reviews.Author: Ur Shezi
Reviews.Content: i hope it may have 10X zoom16mega pixelslong batterynight modelong tv out cablememory cardhope so

Reviews.Title: Olympus Camera
Reviews.Author: Gwendolyn Krause
Reviews.Content: I can't really rate this product because I bought it as a Christmas gift for one of my daughters.  But usually like Olympus products.

Reviews.Title: no battery
Reviews.Author: Sandra Groman
Reviews.Content: This camera came without a battery so not able to use it.  I live in Fiji so not able to buy a battery, extermely disappointed.

Reviews.Title: default
Reviews.Author: Rosa  Izquierdo
Reviews.Content: Order camera 106-6132322-3946619 has a good point on the lens and it shows more when using the zoom would not have thought that that problem but pc download note that if you notice, I like the product, but not practical to do with this I'm in the U.S. until September 4, respond to do

Reviews.Title: Worst of my life
Reviews.Author: Nicole Mullins
Reviews.Content: I have never had a camera this bad... ever... not since I was 5 years old... no.. never... not even the disposable ones.  I hope I can return it.

3-inch LCD display

ProductInfo.Name: Olympus VR-340 Red 16MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom (Red)
